name: Jeevan Suvarna
profile_summary: Results-driven Software Development Engineer with 4+ years of experience in designing scalable applications, optimizing performance, and enhancing user experiences. Proficient in JavaScript, React, and Node.js, with a track record of delivering high-impact projects. Passionate about creating innovative solutions that drive business growth.

responsibilities: Led migration of a fully-fledged e-commerce platform from Vue.js to React, improving performance and scalability and enhancing SEO metrics by 90%.

Implemented user engagement features like personalized product recommendations and a point-based reward system, driving a 60% increase in customer interactions.
Designed and implemented a Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) architecture using Node.js and Fastify, improving server-side data handling and reducing front-end load by 45%.
Mentored junior developers through code reviews and guidance on best practices.
Collaborated in Agile teams with 85%+ unit test coverage using Jest.
